alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Garland; Lonoke; Perry; Pulaski; Saline; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 10:53PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Perry, northwestern Lonoke, southeastern Conway, Faulkner, west central White, east central Garland, central Saline and northern Pulaski Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1052 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Toad Suck to near Wye Mountain to 10 miles northwest of Salem in Saline County to 9 miles north of Lonsdale to near Hot Springs Village. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Greenbrier... Vilonia... Mayflower... Wooster... Rose Bud... Enola... Menifee... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Garland; Lonoke; Perry; Pulaski; Saline; White
